title: Best hotel in madrid
description: Blest four season hotels in the world. Great pool! Professional and knowledgeable Conceirges!! Nice staff! New and modern decorations!! Location is convenient and can walk to every attraction. We really have great experience there.

title: Excellent
description: The Four Seasons Madrid is amazing!  If you want a hotel that will make sure you have a personal experience that meets your needs, stay at the Four Seasons Madrid.  I don't usually provide feedback, but I feel that this hotel deserves to be recognized for their outstanding facilities and service.

title: The Iconic Four Seasons Madrid
description: Perfect amazing stay at Four Seasons Madrid Such Iconic masterpiece building with an excellent location to everywhere starting from McDonald's and Starbucks and El Mundo Disko the famous Techno Club Also very closer to the Metro not even 1 minute walking and you are all surrounding by spanish varieties of authentic restaurants ? ? if u r craving some delicious Paella and Tapas con Vino.  The Service was beyond amazing ?? ? ? starting from the Housekeeping to the front desk team And Dont forget to visit the famous Dani Restaurant and have some great pictures at their terrace and watch the sunset with their fabulous drinks and food

title: Fabulous Hotel
description: We just returned from a fabulous stay at The Four Seasons Madrid and cannot stop talking about the experience.  We arrived by taxi and were greeted at the door by Gaetan, who escorted us to the front desk, checked us in, then escorted us to the room and explained all of its features.  This level or service, being greeted at the door and escorted all the way to the room by the same person is first class.  Gaetan also checked us out and greeted us by name.  We enjoyed dinner the first night in Dani, the rooftop restaurant.  It was Valentine's day and the restaurant was well decorated and playing fun music.  The food and drinks were delicious and the service was excellent.  The manager helped us to choose a great bottle of wine.  We had cocktails another night in Isa Cocktail Bar, which was debuting a new menu.  The server talked us through the interesting menu and recommended inventive drinks that we thoroughly enjoyed.   Each night with turndown service there was an interesting card placed on the bed with information about the hotel or local points of interest (food markets, museums, etc).  This was such a nice touch.  The concierge recommended a seafood restaurant that was exactly what we wanted.  Finally, the location is great and we were able to walk everywhere....The Prado, The Royal Palace, restaurants, Retiro Park.  Even among other Four Seasons Hotels, this property stands out.

title: Excellent Stay!!
description: From the moment we pulled up to the hotel, we knew we were in for a treat! The bellman was overly friendly and eager to welcome us to the hotel. The front desk staff was attentive, quick and welcoming!  We were taken to our room by the Front Desk agent who showed us all of the features of the room. The room was --- in a word -- perfect. Everything you needed, nothing you didnt and it all functioned extremely well!  We enjoyed drinks in the lobby, at Dani and meals there as well. We also spent time in the fitness center and in the spa. All experiences were excellent!  One highlight --- we had been out shopping and were going to just pass by the hotel to drop off a bag. The bellman who welcomed us recognized us and offered to take the bags off our hands and put them in our room so we did not have to go into the hotel and could continue exploring the city. Now that is service!  I would stay at this hotel over and over again! Excellent location, phenomenal service, delicious food and beverage and lovely rooms.   Thank you to the staff at the Four Seasons Madrid!

title: Extra Mile
description: As a FS employee I felt the warmest welcome!! Although I stayed only one night, it was the best experience ever! Thank you so much front desk team and Concierge team for all your kindness and assistance, as well as Dani and ISA team at dinner and breakfast who were so nice. Overall, I felt the FS style and service, as it is the best service and that�S what makes a guest�S stay, the people, and all of you made mine. Special thanks to Joaquim at Concierge, who made my stay even more special with his superb assistance in everything, and Theo at Dani, who made our dinner the most fun, and the most delicious with his suggestions and attention. Definately the FS extra mile in every little detail.

title: Four Seasons Madrid. The Place to stay !
description: Home away from home is an understatement for the Four Seasons Madrid. We spent a wonderful time! Great Rooms and installations, great location, lovely people taking care of you, excellent gym, pool, spa, restaurants

title: The Best Christmas
description: Dear Four Seasons Madrid,  Thank you for one of the most memorable Christmas celebration for our family.   We had the opportunity to stay at your hotel during the weekend of Christmas, and every member of your team welcomed us as if as a guest to your amazing home.  Everyone made our visit exceptional; from the driver from the airport to the hotel, all the staff that greeted us as we pulled up to the hotel, the front desk staff that not only made our welcome early in the morning so bright but also started a �treasure hunt� for our son with the Four Season�s passport, the concierge team that not only made all reservations so seamless but also helped our son collect all the stamps for his passport, and of course, Santa, who showed our son all around the hotel!  We arrived early in the morning, and not only was our suite ready for us, but the hotel had set up an amazing breakfast for us in our room, complete with coffee and champagne!  Throughout the whole stay, every member of the hotel went out of their way to welcome us and make our son feel like a superstar.  We had the opportunity to celebrate Christmas Eve at the hotel gala.  The ambience and food was incredible; however, even more memorable was the focus on the guests, especially our son, who ended up on stage singing with the evening entertainers!  The next morning, he met Santa, who gave him a tour of the hotel as well as being gracious enough to take pictures with him in front of the Christmas Tree.  We also had the opportunity to dine at Isa restaurant.  Once again, the food and cocktails were amazing, but the highlight was how the staff, our server and the manager, made our son feel so special.  He was taken to the kitchen with a chef�s hat, got to learn how to make sushi, and even sign the �celebrity book�!  We have had the privilege and honor of visiting many Four Seasons hotels, as well as many other extraordinary hotels.  The Four Seasons Madrid with their amazing staff and property has set a new bar in hospitality.  Thank you so much for welcoming us to your home and celebrating Christmas with us.  I think the only problem is that now our son thinks he is a superstar and only wants to visit your hotel from now on!

title: magnificent hotel in wonderful location
description: fantastic hotel.  From reception of the requested transfer to the hotel at the airport, until arrival (it was late at night) we were very well received at the accommodation.  The reception staff were extremely polite and kind, provided us with all the necessary information and were willing to help us with whatever we needed.  We stayed with a child from our family, and the hotel prepared everything perfectly well so that he could also rest with his parents.  room with cradle and teddy bears accommodated waiting for the accommodation.  Exceptional cleanliness and wonderful breakfast with many options of jams, fruits and yogurts.  Wonderful location and impeccable decor.  we definitely recommend!  Our experience in Madrid was perfect from start to finish and we thank the Four Seasons Madrid team for all the services they provided.

title: Exceptional
description: Exceptional place, exceptional staff, exceptional experience.  I know that It will probably sound strange to be so positive about a hotel, but really, this is a class of its own. The location of the hotel, the architectural beauty of the building, the facilities, the quality of the interior fittings, the incredible services make it a unique place.

title: My son and I agree that this is the best Four Seasons from our world travels.
description: The entire staff, amenities, rooms, and location are all 5+ Stars. Our only regret is that we didn�t book spa services.  Our dinner at Dani was excellent as well as the impressive whiskey collection both at the bar and the �secret� vault collection.

title: Fabulous!!
description: Simply spectacular!! 6 stars! If it�s within your budget, don�t think about it twice. The Concierge is on demand via text�exceptional!! Can�t wait to go back! We spent New Years at Dani Brasserie on the roof top and had an amazing time. Hotel is new and gorgeous!

title: Amazing!!
description: The hotel is beautiful!! The service unlike any other, one of a kind! From the moment you arrive until the moment you leave, it�s a constant, professional, and impressive service and ambiance! Also, the food and decoration in Dani and Isa were incredible!

title: Wonderful
description: I had one of the best hotel experiences of my life. I felt so comfortable and so welcomed. Services are great, staff are wonderful and friendly. Everything is very natural and perfect at the same time. I loved the design of the hotel and the room. The lights bring a comfortable environment that makes you feel good. Restaurant food is delicious and fresh. Breakfast is super healthy and with many options. Everything was amazing. Thank you so much to all of the Four Season team.

title: Perfectly comfortable home base for your Madrid stay
description: Could not think of a better hotel experience than what the Four Seasons offered during our short week visit to Madrid.  Every staff member was so pleasant, helpful, smiling and friendly - whether at 7am or midnight . Concierge made us reservations via email and made multiple alterations.  Rooms are beautiful. Maid service impeccable.  Breakfast while expensive seems to have been included and was perfectly fine - more fruits and oatmeal would have been preferred next time :) The restaurant was a bit of a disappointment - pricey and not quite commensurate with the level it was obviously striving for. All in all, but for the price, would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Madrid.  A perfect home base and very comfortable and welcoming.

title: A must in the heart of vibrant Madrid
description: We enjoyed having all the landmarks at a walking distance. The room was super comfy and beautifully designed, as we expected. Not to mention how refined was the food at both the breakfast and dinner at Dani Brasserie. Last but not least, the SPA treatments and facilities were splendid ! I also got the chance to do my trainings at the gym each day of my stay, which contributed to make it wonderful ! There's plenty of equipments, all brand new, which I really appreciated. Obviously, the quality of the service and the smile of Four Seasons staff were the icing on the cake !

title: A true representative of the Dour Seasons brand
description: If you would like to really experience the four seaons wuality brand stay at the Four Seasons in Madrid.  The quality of the people, hotel decor, service, atmosphere, toiletries, etc extracts the true essence of the brand. Will definetly atay every time we are in Madrid

title: Exceptional Choice in Madrid
description: Four Seasons are among our top choices for accommodation and this one is among our favourites.  An excellent location, wonderfully refurbished and above all are the staff who are among the best.  Our room was wonderfully cozy looking over the entrance. We tried all of the F&B venues and enjoyed them especially Isa and Dani.  The spa is expansive with great facilities.  Attention to detail abounds - where else would someone like Thomas turn over each plate before placing it at a table.  To make sure it is the right way round�despite there being no logo on the plate!  Incredible attention and we notice it!  Thank you for a great stay and we look forward to returning to see new friends�Raul, Carlos, Theo, Fouad and many more

title: Best Hotel In Madrid
description: We spent 5 days in Seville and the last day of our trip we took the train to Madrid before our flight back to the USA. We stayed at the 4 Seasons. This was the best last night of a trip. The staff at the hotel was amazing. They said YES to every question we asked. The tablets in the room allowed us to order breakfast room service before our long flight home. We ate lunch in the lobby and dinner upstairs at DANI The mattress was the most comfortable. Our room had a balcony over Calle de Alacala and we watched a 6 piece string get together on the street. They arranged our transportation to the airport easily. The room was gorgeous and luxurious. I would definitely stay her the next time I am in Madrid.  One of the best hotels we have ever stayed at for so many reasons. Staff,

title: Perfection in Madrid!
description: This is my second stay at the Four Seasons Hotel Madrid in the past 14 months and the hotel is spectacular! The service is amazing, the rooms are gorgeous, the location is super convenient--I can go on and on. I'm a frequent traveler and literally cannot think of one thing to complain about with this hotel--it's fantastic! I arrived at the hotel at around 8:30 am and was allowed to check-in and go straight to my beautiful, and upgraded, room. I spent four great nights there and can't wait to go back!

title: Excellent
description: Nice building,  excellent service and food  We liked the amenity , very clean room and comfortable bed and elegant atmosphere . We will visit frequently as we have some business in Madrid.  Looking forward for our next visit in January 2023

title: The highlight of our trip.
description: You feel special from the moment you enter the hotel, the warm welcome from the staff and the professionalism and the attention to every detail that matters, as well as the music at the lobby, which was fantastic as we enjoyed having small bites, tea, coffee and dessert there.  Nice rooms with comfortable beds, very good dry cleaning service, water bottles provided everyday. Many thanks to the staff at the front desk for being tolerant and having the endurance on the first day and giving us the chance to look at different rooms. And thanks to the room dining supervisor for sending the delicious cheese plate and the desserts. Cons: 1- The in room dining was horrible, the pizza was hard and tasted too salty and the fries weren't fresh.  2- Add to that the breakfast on the 7th

title: New, classy, luxury hotel in central Madrid
description: The property is very classy, at a central location where they are building a small plaza with luxury brands, around 4 mins walk to Puerta del Sol.  Was told the hotel was only opened two years ago!    Rooms are spacious, our room had a small balcony, a huge walk in wardrobe and a generous bathroom.    Service was impeccable, breakfast was amazing and thank you to the hospitality of the team and the manager of the restaurant.    For those who likes to shop hermes, there is a small shop connected to the lobby of the hotel.

title: Laurena an outstanding manager from Four Seasons reception and excellent service from all staff members.
description: Laurena a manager from reception front desk is amazing extremely professional and attentive, I have allergies to dust and pollen, she gave me the perfect room. I was impressed by how professional her and the entire four seasons team in dealing with us and how they take care of all the details and make sure you are comfortable all the time, the best hotel staff team l, thank you so much for everything.

title: Outstanding service and property
description: Everything is fantastic, Jose from the front desk is so hospitable, amazing concierge team.   Laurena, took good care of us and made sure we e have the best stay possible.  Location is perfect.   Overall I highly recommend it, and I�ll be staying there again in my next trip to Madrid.

title: Jewel in the Tree of the four Seasons
description: Incredible stay with impeccable service from each and every staff member. The staff goes out of their way to be kind, welcoming and helpful. Many thanks to Pierre, Marta, joiue, the entire concierge team, Marcus and every server at breakfast. The genuine smiles and warmth will never be forgotten. Please go and enjoy the gorgeous Hotel with a heart????

title: OUTSTANDING 5 Star Hotel
reviewed: The Four Seasons Madrid has to be one of the BEST 5 star hotels in the world!!! My husband/I have been blessed to stay at many high end properties and FS rivals them all!!! We just stayed for 5 nights and were graciously upgraded - thank you esp. to Beatriz at Front Desk and Camino for such generous hospitality - making our 1st trip to Madrid and special occasions truly perfect!!!  If light sleepers as we are, I recommend either facing interior courtyard or the mostly pedestrian street on 1 side of the hotel (overnight no cars unless emergency). You can also request a fan in your room to drown out noise which also helps tremendously!  I agree with all previous reviews the hotel has been immaculately renovated in the most gorgeous building - all high end fixtures, modern

title: Exceptional in every way
description: From the greeting as walked in to the departure the service, room quality, food and facilities were best of best. Room was modern with very high ceilings and complimentary nuts and premium coffee and waters. Service was amongst best I�ve experienced in premium hotel class.

title: Elegant beautiful hotel
description: Beautiful hotel and beautiful service.  Stayed 3 nights and would highly recommend it.   Hotel was built in a stunning redesign of an old architectural wonder.   It is elegant but not the least bit stuffy, service is excellent and hotel rooms are well thought out with high quality linens and very comfortable beds.  Staff are very well trained and thoughtful.

title: Gorgeous Hotel
description: Beautiful place, excellent service, the spa is amazing. The renovation they did kept the charm of an old building but with super modern features. Stuff is very friendly and makes you feel at home and tries to accommodates all your needs.

title: Short but sweet stay
description: We spent 3 nights here as apart of birthday celebrations for my other half.  The hotel is located in the heart of the city which provides you easy access to Everything. It�s is also not too far from the airport.  Staff are very welcoming and lovely. Especially their restaurant staff, Meli Milagros was simply adorable and so was Marta Agudin from breakfast service. These girls were excellent. Carlos from the rooftop restaurant ( Dani) was also very friendly and welcoming.  The sleep quality was perfect and the range of amenities/ products in the room and bathroom were amazing.   All the small touches made this stay very memorable and we are thankful for it.

title: Wonderful hotel !
description: We went to the Four Seasons in family to celebrate my birthday. The hotel is ideally located and is absolutely fabulous. The service is the best I ever seen is my life. People are friendly, helping and are really kind with children. Rooms are fabulous as well. I can�t wait to go back again!

title: TOP
description: Fabulous Hotel in exceptional location. This recently completed Hotel has all the services the most decerning global visitors from all parts of the planet can expect. Exceptional location, nicely top decoratef rooms/ suites, nice Spa health Club, the DANI rooftop bar with outside terras where you can enjoy a refreshing buffet. The service from arrival is TOP. The WELCOME comit� on arrival, Concierge Service, QUICK discrete CHECK IN, � The Gouvernante of housekeeping is onhand ..special MERCY to Svetlana .. A multilingual Staff is very attentive to assist their guests. The domotica in every room keeps permanent contact to satisfy their guests.  ??? to Management and Staff  4 Seasons is a global LEADER in hospitality business

title: Best hotel in Madrid
description: We love the stay at the Four Seasons Madrid. Amazing location close to lots of great restaurants and tourist spots. Our suite was huge with an amazing view and the decor is beautiful. There's a lot of staff per guests and they all are very kind and always smiling and very welcoming. The food at the restaurants is great too.

title: Prime Luxury Location, Walkability, Exceptional Concierge Team
description: We spent a long weekend in Madrid and FS was the perfect location to explore this clean, friendly city.  Hotel is a reprieve from the bustling capital.  Concierge staff arranged outstanding walking tour with Marta one day and a fun Segway tour in El Retiro Park.with Sara another.  Both guides top-notch.  Rooms are clean, well appointed, spacious and beds extremely comfortable.  Hotel staff is friendly and takes the time to learn their guests.  Looking forward to returning!

title: Fantastic luxury hotel
description: We loved our three night stay  at the Four Seasons Hotel Madrid. It is in a wonderful location within walking distance to fine dining and lots of site-seeing. The beds are VERY comfortable, the rooms are quiet and clean, and the spa is outstanding! We also enjoyed the rooftop bar for breakfast, one great dinner, and cocktails.  As usual, the staff make any stay memorable and the service here was impeccable and gracious. We would go back in a heartbeat.

title: Impeccable Service, Excellent Property and Convenient Location
description: We stayed at the Four Seasons Madrid for eight days and had a fabulous experience.  One has high expectations for a Four Seasons considering the price point, and I must say that this property fully delivers and then some.  The staff is top notch and affirmatively works to deliver a customized and frictionless experience. As an example, we were looking for a local spirit that we had purchased when in Spain over ten years ago and could not get in the U.S.  The Hotel tracked down a local source and ensured that we procured several bottles within a very short window.  The hotel property is exceptional.  Since the hotel just opened a couple of years ago, the rooms are fresh and current.   My favorite amenity was the hotel chat.  Each room has an iPad which can be used to make

title: The best place to stay in Madrid
description: Four Seasons Madrid was the best hotel experience ever. Top notch service from A-Z Beautiful Rooms, Roof Top Pool, Dani the restaurant great food and drinks. The staff really made the difference. The service was 10 stars!!!

title: Flawless
description: Four Seasons Madrid can be a case study for how hotels should be run. From the moment we arrived everyone was extremely welcoming and accommodating. Concierge is superb with restaurant recommendations and bookings, Restaurant at the terrace has great views and delicious food, and location is a very quick walk away from most attractions.   I would not even try another hotel when I visit Madrid again.

title: True hospitality
description: The Four Seasons Madrid made our honeymoon so memorable! From the moment we set foot on the property, the staff made it clear that their top priority was to ensure we had a wonderful experience. The room, spa and other amenities were lovely, but the little touches made the experience stand out - a special �happy honeymoon� dessert in our room, a complimentary ride to dinner, etc. Special thanks to Edoardo for all his assistance. We will definitely return!

title: Simply the best
description: The Four Seasons Madrid exceeded my expectations. From the gorgeous, historic building that is steps away from Puerto del Sol, to the elegant rooms outfitted with modern technology, I cannot recommend this hotel enough.   The staff awaits you at every turn, going above and beyond to see that you have the best visit possible.   There is a buzzy rooftop bar and restaurant, Dani, which has been beautifully designed.   The true differentiator for us was the concierge staff. Ahead of my arrival, I chatted with them over text and they helped us book restaurants and tours. Once I arrived, I met the women I had been communicating with and they helped us make more reservations based on our moods and desires. Laura, Veronica, and Marie made our stay in Madrid simply magical. Their local

title: Amazing hotel location and service incredible
description: I have traveled different places around the world. This hotel is centrally located, excellent for walking to sites.  Amazing staff, their service is perfect. I don�t think I have ever said the before. Rooms are quiet and great beds for sleeping.  Highly recommend this hotel!

title: One of the best luxury hotels
description: When one stays at a Four Seasons Hotel, one automatically readjusts expectations to a very high level. However, this hotel surpassed all my expectations. The location is perfect, in the heart of Madrid, with well-preserved historical buildings all around. The hotel building is beautiful with beautiful renovations of an old elegant bank building with all modern luxury amenities. The staff, especially the doormen, concierge and reception staff were very friendly, attentive and very efficient. The fitness room was exceptional, probably the best I have seen in Europe. The staff at the Fitness Room, especially Marta was excellent. Definitely one of the best hotels in Europe!

title: 1 stop for our honeymoon
description: Perfect location, amazing pool and spa facilities.  Beautiful rooms and wonderful amenities.  Wonderful staff, very welcoming! Great check in and room escort experience from Franca (hope we got the name right) ! Special thanks thanks to Paola from reservations for the warm welcome  and Eduardo from the Front Desk for an amazing departure experience.  Dinner at Dani was the best meal we ever had and the waiters were phenomenal.  Congrats on an overall spectacular product!

title: Four Seasons Madrid is in a different class
description: This should honestly be a 6 star review. The staff from the doorman, front desk and concierge (Joaquin?) were exceptional. I couldn�t praise this hotel highly enough and I have stayed in quite a few Four Seasons priorities. Top, top class!

title: Best Hotel in Spain-Four Seasons Madrid
description: I had one of my best experience in Four Seasons Madrid. Every staff member I encountered , from balet to check in to the cleaning stuff were delightful and eager to help. Thank you for everything. Best hotel i have ever been. Special thanks for Ramon, Alejandra , and Dani team to make my daughter s days special.

title: Best cocktails
description: We stayed at a different hotel but we visited Four Seasons Madrid and wished we stayed there. It was fabulous. We had the best cocktails at ISA bar. My dad had a great time with the whisky tasting. It�s definitely the best place to go to in the city

title: WOW
description: First time in Madrid. We stayed at this recently opened Four Seasons for the weekend on way to our summer beach trip. Truly exceptional property and location. Staff and service went above and beyond. Spa and fitness facility was superb.  I am sure frequent travelers to Four Seasons will be impressed with this property (even though August in Madrid is hot and relatively quiet, there was still a great atmosphere). Highly recommend!!!

title: Wonderful stay
description: A very pleasant experience that we will want to repeat again.  Lovely room, beautiful roof top deck for breakfast, helpful & attentive staff.  Easy access to and from airport.  Surrounding shopping is OK too.

title: Best birthday feeling
description: i recommend to spend your birthday in Madrid at the four seasons hotel. It is a lovely experience. The staff is amazing. From the moment you step out of your car you enter a moment of Alice in wonderland. I certainly did!

title: Everything 5 Star, except for concierge.
description: We had a lovely experience with the food, room, pool, and staff! Guest experiences was especially helpful.   Unfortunately concierge spent two days trying to book us a wine tour that was no longer offered and we lost a major activity. We ended up reworking plans for that day but it was something we had been looking forward to. They said that many of the activities had recently changed but I would have hoped that the concierge staff would have been more up-to-date on it.  Otherwise the experience was phenomenal. The rooms were some of the best we have stayed in, and the breakfast restaurant had the most delicious eggs Benedict I have ever had. Downstairs the cocktail lounge had the �Maverick� and I encourage anyone to try it.

title: Racist against Asians!
description: Do NOT come here if you�re Asian! My mother and I were guests at a nearby hotel and decided to come here for high tea. We sat in the lobby for 1 hour until our pastry tower arrived. We arrived at 3:00 and the food didn�t arrive until 4:15. The host was very curt and made it seem like a hassle to serve us. 2 young caucasian women came 40 minutes after us and were served instantly - their pastry tower arriving shortly after they ordered. The host, Norma, was extremely cheerful when communicating with them and offered to take their picture, but not us. Also, they gave everyone plates for their food except us. We were the only Asian people in the lobby and it felt extremely degrading and inhumane to see the treatment of all the other guests in comparison to us. The only staff member

title: Nice stay in Madrid
description: It�s a very nice hotel in the middle of the city with very nice gym and pool where you can relax after long day.also, the rooftop restaurant very nice with wonderful view and food where u can spend nice evening.moreover, the staff very helpful  specially Alejandra in the front desk, she helped us a lot and Mr. Chafic is a very nice person. Also, I won�t forgot your amazing concierge that are very professional.

title: The Best of The Best
description: The Four Seasons Hotel Madrid is an example of one of the best hotels in Madrid.  The hotel was opened in 2020. So everything is new and the hotel contains many modern technologies.  The main attributes characteristic of this hotel: The amazing restaurant Dani on the roof of the hotel.  Having breakfast here is an extraordinary experience when the city is waking up.  The luxury spa is spread over 3 floors and includes a very well-equipped gymnasium, a wonderful rooftop pool with terraces and very opulent facilities.  Anyone who knows the experience of Four Seasons hotels knows that sleeping in a bed is a pleasure.  On top of all the luxurious amenities is the absolutely unprecedented excellent attitude of the staff in all departments of the hotel.  What makes a stay at the Four

title: Great hotel
description: Loved the hotel and the professionalism of the staff. The rooms are modern and very well designed.  The spa and fitness center have everything you need for a work out.  I will definitely return to the Four Seasons Madrid!

title: Great hotel� bad concierge
description: Very nice and new hotel.  The rooms are fantastic.  Some of the best I have seen.  Great service at the front desk and the spa/pool.  However the concierge was horrible.  I had called the day before we arrived and asked them to make us a reservation at a high end tapas place.  I didn�t have a preference for which one but assume there are many such places in the center of Madrid.  They said they had just the place.  I called back later that day and asked for them to expand the reservation as some of our local friends were going to join.  They said they could seat us in the bar area.  I indicated this wasn�t going to work as our friends have young kids and frankly that wasn�t the kind of ambiance we wanted.  I asked them to find us a new place.  They called back and aid they had a

title: Finest City Hotel.
description: Best in class luxury hotel, wonderful decor, relaxed ambience with attentive impeccable service, the staff across the hotel were truly on top of their game. Superb city hotel, perfect location with a list of five star amenities. Look forward to returning.

title: Outstanding Hotel in Madrid
description: Wonderful facility, excellent location and perfect service. I have travelled a lot all over the world but this is one of the best hotels I have ever been. It is not cheap but worth every euro. The building is like a palace and the service is second to none. Especially breakfast and dinner on the rooftop are amazing.

title: Impecable
description: Great hotel. Tick all the boxes. Service was smooth and attentive. Breakfast by Dani Garc�a a la carte was perfect. Cocktails also there. The room was not very big, but everything was done to perfection. Classy ammenities , nice Minibar. Go if you don't mind paying it

title: Perfectly located.  Amazingly complete.
description: This property will not disappoint.  From the moment you walk in, until the moment you check out.  We enjoyed the rooms (excellent) the bars (especially the 7th floor rooftop- amazing views) the food (both on property and below in the food court) and it�s location is absolutely perfect for walking anywhere.   It�s a tad pricey, but at least you won�t regret it.  Beautifully done.

title: Madrid
description: 4 Seasons did not let us down. This is a spectaculiar hotel, the employees genuinely love their jobs and it shows. For someone that is unfamilar with Madrid, like us,  the ease of the conceriege setting up planes, trains, restaurants, cars, you name it. So professional and nothing was too hard.

title: Excellent
description: We greatly enjoyed our stay at the Four Seasons Madrid.  The location is excellent within walking distance to many  attractions.  Our Junior Suite was well appointed and spacious with a lovely balcony.  The hotel is beautifully decorated and the staff warm and friendly.  We greatly enjoyed dinner at the rooftop Dani restaurant. All in all a highly rated stay.

title: Surprise birthday
description: I surprised my husband with a trip to Europe for his birthday and Madrid was our last stop. The concierge team at the Four Seasons worked with me to ensure he had an unforgettable experience. They even put up with me changing room types multiple times via chat! I cannot recommend this hotel enough. They go above and beyond to meet their guests needs. The hotel itself is beautifully restored and impeccably decorated. The service is what makes it shine.

title: Madrid for a night
description: I can�t imagine a better hotel. Service ,rooms, restaurants (roof top bar) were nothing less than amazing. Center of city, lots to do with in walking distance,25 min to airport. Been to a lot of 4 seasons�as good as they get Expensive but well worth it!!

title: Best hotel in Madrid
description: This new hotel is in the center of the city. The service is impeccable and the everything is brand new in the rooms. The level of detail to attention has been the best of all the Four Seasons we've stayed in.

title: Wonderful Experience
description: I had a wonderful experience at the Four Seasons in Madrid. I had planned to secretly propose to my girlfriend in one of their suites and surprise her with the family joining us afterwards for a drink to celebrate. We were then going to head to the Dani Restaurant to all have lunch together.   When I first asked the reservations team if this would be possible, they immediately put me in touch with their Guest Services department who could not have done more for me. A lady named Lorena Gonzalez immediately helped me plan the whole occasion and arranged for champagne, flowers and balloons to be placed in the room. She also then helped with the arrangement of bringing my partner to the room, and then her family shortly afterwards. The service we received was truly over and above

title: Amazing first stay
description: Four Seasons Madrid is an exceptional hotel which is on par with the company�s best properties such as Paris, Florence, and Hong Kong.   In many ways it feels like an urban resort: everything you want in a big city hotel but also an indoor rooftop pool and beautiful sun terraces with amazing views overlooking the city.   Staff here are warm, efficient, and extremely profesional. Excellent housekeeping, concierge, reception, and restaurant staff. The rooms and public areas are beautifully designed with high-end finishes throughout.   Tip: have an afternoon �Luz� cocktail on the 7th floor terrace   This was my first trip to this hotel, and I am already thinking about coming back. Do go.

title: Excellent Hotel with impeccable service.
description: Was an exceptionally wonderful stay. Spoilt from the beginning. Been to many Four Seasons however this is my top three of my Four Seasons. Service was impeccable, exceptional and excellent. Highly recommend this hotel. Thank you Four Seasons Madrid.

title: 4 Stars Masquerading as 5
description: There is not much that's positive I can say about this hotel.  It's located in a run-down area close to nowhere you want to go.  The hotel's dining options are limited: snacks at the Bar, limited dishes in the small lobby area or Dani on the top floor which they hail as their signature Spanish dining venue. The trouble with Dani is the decor is soulless and the staff have such an attitude as to be offensive - other reviewers here have complained about the hostess/receptionist for some time. After a drink on the terrace on the first night we decided we'd drink and dine elsewhere for the rest of the stay, so I can't comment on the food.  The website images of the rooms are misleading: the Deluxe Alcala room at EUR950 per night did not have floor to ceiling windows onto the street

title: Fantastic Hotel in great location
description: The building is fabulous and the area is central to everywhere in Madrid. Food can be a problem for those seeking Asian or Halal food. Rooms are very clean and have the right d�cor. Overall the service is in line with the standard you would expect from Four Seasons.

title: Best new hotel in Madrid
description: Four Seasons just opened in Madrid last year and so far it's the best hotel I've stayed in in Madrid. The location is outstanding, the service is up to the high standards of the Four Seasons brand, and the room we got was so beautiful that we did not want to go out. Fortunately it was raining during our time in Madrid and so we spent most of our time inside the hotel. Highly recommended compared to other luxury hotels in the city. I've stayed in most.

title: A jewel in Madrid
description: Having revisited Madrid after a couple of years, I stayed at the new Four Seasons Hotel. Located in a building that previously housed a bank, the property is simply amazing. Rooms are decorated in contemporary style with state-of-the-art technology: the air conditioning is practically soundless. There are two restaurants: Isa for edgy Asian fusion food and Dani on top floor which is another great achievement by the Spanish chef Dani Garc�a (also ate at his Lobito de Mar restaurant in the fashionable area of Recoletos). At Dani, the nitro tomato with gazpacho and the hamburger are two of his signature dishes which one simply must try. The rooftop health club has a spacious terrace with view to relax after a good swim. But apart from the property and dining options, the most

title: Totally Luxurious, Incredible Staff
description: The hotel is so beautiful and the rooms are so pretty and comfortable that we hardly wanted to see Madrid.  The staff was outstanding in every way.  From the front dest, to housekeeping to food service.  Everyone was so professional, yet incredibly warm and personable too.  The hotel is in a great location for shopping, sightseeing, restaurants. While staying in a Four Seasons is always a treat,  we found the Four Seasons in Madrid to the best of the best.  Can't wait to go back.

title: A new bar has been set for properties in Europe
description: Outstanding service, architecture and amenities (especially the Dani rooftop restaurant). The hotel is a destination onto itself and we can do nothing but say congratulations. You have set a new bar for properties in Spain and Europe more broadly. A special shoutout to Enrique and Fernando from the door, Marina from the spa, Leticia from concierge and the entire housekeeping staff.

title: Excellent service
description: We stayed at the hotel for a long bank holiday weekend, it was our first time at a Four Seasons and in Madrid. The hotel is extremely comfortable, the beds are amazing, the terraces spacious and the marble bathrooms large and well specced. The spa over 4 floors is also not to be missed. The hotel is right in the centre of the city and yet superbly sound proofed, even the terraces are quiet. We were particularly impressed by the service, starting from Pablo who took care of our airport transfer very seamlessly, Astrid and the concierge team who patiently attended to all of our requests, in person and over whatsapp, and came up with great recommendations, to Deranja and the spa team for a very relaxing treatment. Thank you all.

title: The ultimate in luxury
description: I stayed for 1 day in a Superior Courtyard Room (King bed). The location of the hotel is super convenient, it is in a walkable area. My room was super comfortable, quiet and beautiful. Staff were highly professional.  The chat service (iPad) is your info gateway to anything you desire.  Great stay.   SEE photos

title: Poor front desk manager(four seasons Madrid)
description: Disappointing how poor front desk manager, Monica, handles customer service.  She doesn�t listen to you, but enjoys listening to herself speak.  Constantly using the word� I am sorry, but�  bellman, staff at restaurant were outstanding.  We had a leak in our room as well as they failed to clean the room after first day.  She is very arrogant.  Unfortunately for the resort.

title: ISA Japanese cuisine amazing!
description: Don�t even know what to say here. First class service, food, drinks and music! Atmosphere was buzzing. Only been open for 3 months and the staff are a well gelled team already! This will be some place when it�s very established. Nothing was too much effort and it made our weekend break special!

title: A little piece of PARADISE
description: I couldn't recommend the Four Seasons Hotel, Madrid, highly enough. From the decor to the location to the service - everything was wonderful.   The bedrooms were beautiful and so well thought out - disposable coffee cups to use for a grab and go early morning, an iPad by the bed for instant messaging, plenty of storage space.   The staff were incredible - each department was so helpful, genuine and always had a smile on their face. Everyone was so friendly and assured each guest felt truly relaxed.   I unfortunately did not have time to trial out any of the hotel restaurants/bars but based on how great the in-room dining food was, I can only imagine the excellent quality in the actual restaurants themselves.   I would absolutely LOVE to come back and stay at this hotel again -

title: Great New Four Seasons
description: A really good new four seasons. Love the mix of heritage and modernity - everything seems premium as well as feeling fresh.  Our four seasons suite was a little on the small side and there was no natural light in the living room. I�d say this felt more like a junior suite really which at 1400 euros a night was a bit too pricey. Nicely appointed and luxurious though.  Housekeeping excellent - love the touches like leaving a screen cleaner on our laptops and cable ties on charging cables - the screen cleaner was a new one to us at a four seasons.  Dani restaurant was ok - not great in either food or service to be honest. Some of the servers were a little on the aggressive / domineering side. Needs a rethink and the food is miles away from the Dani in Marbella. Roof terrace is

title: Outstanding vacation - Madrid Feb 2022
description: Exemplary hotel. Location and staff responsiveness is outstanding! Dani Restaurant is a �must� food deliciousness experience. The kindness, attention to detail and our safety was very much appreciated as this was our first trip to Spain while following strict CoVid guidelines. And can I just mention - that the hotel arranged CoVid testing with quality medical staff for successful results to allow our departure back to the United States out of Madrid. Wow!

title: Awesome Hotel in Madrid
description: �Awesome hotel in Madrid. The location perfect the rooms were beyond what we expected. Concierge was very polite and made sure to assist with an early check in and were very kind at all time. Staff and personal extremely friendly.  The food was great, with wonderful service. Will return again when visiting Madrid, thank you for the wonderful experience.�

title: FITUR 2022
description: It was really a great stay and it was a great pleasure to stay in the hotel and enjoy the hospitality of the team in the Hotel , all the team was super professional and helpful, next visit I will be with my family soon ,  Really appreciate the help and professionalism of the team to make my stay enjoyable.

title: Perfect in every way!
description: The stay was perfect in every way. From being extremely helpful (last minute booking for next day arrival), to the concierge (Veronica was the best! We got all our restaurants reservations thanks to her!) and a wonderfully warm Indonesian lady at the Spa reception (Yuli?). Every staff at the hotel from the door men to the front desk were just great. Being a very new hotel the rooms are very well appointed. The hotel is now genuinely a landmark in Madrid with their stunning Xmas decorations being a local attraction in itself. It's in a Great location. Four Seasons chat function on the app is really a game changer. Highly rrcommended! Thank you for a lovely stay!

title: Regular breakfast
description: I had breakfast at the Four Seasons Hotel, near the Puerta del Sol. Dani restaurant is on the 7th floor. I had 1 poached egg with hash brown, the egg was well prepared with oily hash brown!!!. This breakfast was ok.   SEE photos.

title: currently best hotel
description: Excellent spa and fintess facilities and excellent stuff in almost all aereas who treat You extremely well if You are a regular client. House car is a real perk, afternoon tea is outstanding and suites are excellent. Hotelmis very central and everything is close by: definitely the best hotel in town currently.

title: Superb hotel with wonderful employees
description: Best hotel in Madrid. Perfect location and great new, refurbished rooms. Concierge was very assistive. They made sure to assist with an early check in and were very kind and welcoming during check in. The food was great, with wonderful service. Will return again

title: Great vacation
description: We were very satisfied with our stay. There were minimum 2 times a day housekeeping, great staff who are very friendly, great location, very helpful door staff. Definitely enhanced our vacation in Madrid, many thanks for everything, definitely recommend  it

title: Absolutely amazing
description: My was a business trip. It was everything very lovely! From the moment I entered in the room until I left. The staff is super professional and really friendly. Available for every requests.  The spa absolutely magnificent! Therapists and receptionists very smiley and nice! 111skin products are the best

title: Very good but not great
description: Enjoyed our 3 night stay very much. Rooms immaculate and the entire team wanted to please from the moment we arrived. Would have given 5 stars but felt the lobby bar/ restaurant was far too small and the rooftop restaurant was only OK. Afraid to say the   Ritz common areas were vastly superior. Suggest that the Hermes store would be better replaced by a more enticing lobby offering.

title: All That One Could Wish For In A Hotel
description: A stunning hotel that is a sanctuary from all the stresses of everyday life. Such a warm and welcoming staff. One cannot help but feel contentment and inspiration by the exquisite original architecture, the works of emerging artists and gorgeous floral designs that grace the lobby.  The rooms are spacious with the most comfortable beds, which is appreciated after 12 hrs of flight time.    Safety during a pandemic is of utmost importance, and I was impressed by all of the staff in masks and the amount of open air spaces allowing fresh air to circulate. Windows to all the guest rooms open, and there is a rooftoop restaurant and pool that also has access to the outside. Both were thoroughly enjoyed.    I wish for more time to relax at the hotel but so much to experience all by

title: someone stole my chanel belt �
description: I stayed in the hotel for 3 nights and the second day I found out that someone from the staff (I�m still thinking It was the cleaning lady) STOLE my chanel belt and my Zimmerman hanger-clothes (No idea for what someone needs a hanger but mine �disappeared�) Of course the managers said that they �investigated� and they could not find evidence of my statement. I�m shocked that in a such expensive hotel can happen this kind of things.  They offered me 1 night �free� next time, of course I WONT accept it, because I never never ever in my life I�m gonna stay in a hotel that I can NoT trust. SO if you want to stay in Four Seasons Madrid, you really have to TAKE care of your things and better to take pictures of all your stuff�

title: Absolutely perfect stay in Madrid
description: My wife and I stayed 6 nights here and could not have been more pleased. The hotel was absolutely beautiful, we really enjoyed the history of the building and great location. The service and amenities were above and beyond, they do an excellent job of representing the Four Seasons brand. So happy with our experience and would recommend the Four Seasons as the #1 place to stay in Madrid.   We really enjoyed the service and food at all of the restaurants including the dinner at Dani, afternoon tea at El Patio, along with room service.  The rooftop indoor pool, state of the art gym, an beautiful terrace views were a big plus. The service at the spa was outstanding and really made us feel welcome and at home.   Every employee we encountered greeted us with a smile and were eager to

title: Luxury in a contemporary yet comfortable way
description: Just got back from a 5 night stay at this luxurious property. Everything from check in to check out was perfect in every way. Room was spacious, with excellent taste in decor, Hermes amenities in the bathroom, super comfy bed and the most amazing shower.  Location in the dead center of Madrid, just a block away from Plaza del Sol can�t be beat. Drinks in the stylish lobby, breakfast at Dani or room service all 5 stars. It took 8 years to have this property finished but it was totally worth the wait.  There is no better place to stay in Madrid. Special thanks to Pablo the most wonderful concierge who was able to score last minute reservations and train tickets to Segovia, Monica at the Front Desk, Delfina the door greeter always with a smile behind her facemask, and to Juan

title: Traveler
description: Perfecto! Building and service were great! Newly renovated building with great design. Located in central Madrid, with the ability to walk everywhere. The staff go above and beyond. Beautiful rooftop restaurant

title: Beautiful hotel with outstanding staff
description: I stay in a lot of hotels and frequently wake up in the night trying to remember where i am.  Not so with the Four Seasons Madrid. First impressions are, well, impressive. Valets are helping with my luggage before I'm out of the taxi. Reception is opulent without being overdone and check in is rapid and welcoming. My actual stay exceeded this early promise. Attention to detail is astounding - even a Bose bluetooth speaker to listen to my tunes. But the real stand-out is the staff. They're friendly, attentive and eager to help. By the second night I was addressed by name almost everywhere, and my preferences for food and drinks had been memorised. After a hard day, alone in a distant country, it means a lot to be greeted with, "You look a little tired, let me get you a beer

title: Rude service.
description: The worst service I have ever experienced for a Four Seasons. The rooftop bar hostesses have a nasty attitude, we sat down & no one came to us for 15 minutes to take our orders. They were not busy, so I cannot justify.

title: Wonderful, stylish and magnificent hotel
description: Me and my girlfriend recently got engaged in this hotel. It is the best hotel we�ve stayed in by some distance. The staff were incredibly kind and immensely helpful from the moment we arrived until we sadly had to say goodbye.   The level of service, quality of food and professionalism of the staff more than justify the price.   The pool and gym facilities, as well as the rooftop area are fabulous and offer unprecedented views of this great city.   The location also couldn�t be better, we did not get a single taxi or metro, everything you would want to see in Madrid is easily walkable from out the front door.  I can�t wait to return!

title: Amazing place in the heart of madrid
description: We just returned from our much needed 3 day stay at Four Seasons Madrid.  At FS Madrid  it�s like you are staying at home. One with five star luxury and five star service. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. From the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out it was perfect! We had an amazing time, the experience was outstanding, the service level is extremely high, the rooms are spacious and luxurious. All the staff is super friendly including the girls from the spa. A special thank you to Kevin at the reception, for making our stay even more unforgettable. Upon arrival he welcomed us with warmed, great kindness and profesionalism, he made us feel immediately at home and relaxed, notwithstanding the elegance and refinement that define this property. At the

title: THE ART OF HOSPITALITY
description: This was one of the most beautiful with outstanding amenities hotel we have stayed in. We loved the superb location at the hearth of Madrid and walkable to all the museums. The service is 7 stars and the attention to detail is amazing. We strongly believe in personalized hospitality and this should be both ways therefore we made a list (for sure not complete) and take the opportunity to extend our thanks to the staff for being so friendly and accommodating waiting on us attentively and always on hand to help: Ricardo, Jorge, Fernando and Jose at the door, Raul, Almoadena and Astrid at the Concierge, Martha, Gregory and Anthony at the Reception, Theodora, Anna, Maria, Maria (Cuenca), Pierre, Emil and Mohamed. The true art of hospitality. We enjoyed it very much! And we will be

title: "One of the Best"
description: I stayed at Four Seasons in Madrid for 4 nights. It was an amazing experience. Staffs are extremely helpful. Everything is excellent - concierge, room service, restaurant and gym. The location is perfect, rooms are comfortable and elegant. The terrace is a nice place to have a good start breakfast and  warm evening. I will surely miss the breakfast. I have to admit at it is one of the best four seasons hotel I have been. Highly recommended and will definitely comeback.  Thank you to all the staffs - very friendly and accommodating.
